mapper.select:
SELECT
,shangjia.id as id ,shangjia.shangjia_name as shangjiaName ,shangjia.shangjia_photo as shangjiaPhoto ,shangjia.shangjia_types as shangjiaTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney
FROM shangjia_report a left JOIN shangjia shangjia ON a.shangjia_id = shangjia.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.shangjia_id = #{params.shangjiaId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.report_reason like CONCAT('%',#{params.reportReason},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.status like CONCAT('%',#{params.status},'%')
and a.shangjia_id IS NOT NULL
and shangjia.id = #{params.shangjiaId}
and shangjia.shangjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shangjiaName},'%')
and shangjia.shangjia_types = #{params.shangjiaTypes}
and shangjia.shangjia_delete = #{params.shangjiaDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shangjia.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shangjia.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
